```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
suppressMessages(library(palmerpenguins))
```


```{r}
# Create a scatter plot, removing NA values
penguins %>%
  drop_na() %>%  # Remove rows with missing values
  ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species, shape = species)) +
  geom_point(size = 4) +
  labs(title = "Penguin Bill Length vs Bill Depth",
       subtitle = "Data from Palmer Penguins",
       x = "Bill Length (mm)",
       y = "Bill Depth (mm)",
       caption = "Source: palmerpenguins package") +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 15) +
  theme(legend.position = "top") +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1") +
  scale_shape_manual(values = c(16, 17, 18))

```
